testcase.name: Successful registration
testcase.preconditions: Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/

step.actions:
1. Click on the button to register
2. User input field username
3. User input field email
4. User input field password
5. User input field repeat password
6. Clicking the acceptance of registration
7. Verify Successful Ragistration
step.expectedresults: Page with all uploaded photos should be loaded and a “Hello, username” greetings should be displayed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful registration: Insert incorrect repeat password
testcase.preconditions: Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/

step.actions:
1. Click button Register
2. Enter username
3. Enter email
4. Enter password
5. Enter invalid password 
6. Click the acceptance of registration
7. Verify Unsuccessful Registration
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over button username:
”The two passwords don’t match”

testcase.name: Unsuccessful registration: The username already exist
testcase.preconditions: Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/

step.actions:
1. Click button Register
2. Enter username
3. Enter email
4. Enter password
5. Repeat password 
6. Click the acceptance of registration
7. Verify Unsuccessful Registration
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over button username:
”User with the same username already exist. Please insert a new one”

testcase.name: Unsuccessful registration: The e-mail is already used by a different user
testcase.preconditions: Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/

step.actions:
1. Click button Register
2. Enter username
3. Enter  email
4. Enter password
5. Repeat the password 
6. Clicking the acceptance of registration
7. Verify Unsuccessful Registration
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over button username:
”This e-mail is already used by other user. Please insert a new one”.

testcase.name: Successful login
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/
2. Use registered user: "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. Click on the Login button
2. User input field username
3. User input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Verify Successful LogIn
step.expectedresults: The user is successful Loget In and after successful login a page with all uploaded photos should be loaded and a “Hello, username” greetings should be displayed

testcase.name: Admin Unsuccessful login: Insert only user, without a password
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. Use Administration account:   "xxxx" without password

step.actions:
1. Click button  Login
2. Enter valid username
3. Click button  Login
4. Verify Login Area
step.expectedresults:
We stays at the current page. Shows up message in red color over button username:
”Please insert Password”.

testcase.name: Admin Unsuccessful login: Insert only password, without a user
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. Use Administration account:   "xxxx" for password, without a username

step.actions:
1. Click button  Login
2. Enter valid password
3. Click button  Login
4. Verify LogIn Area
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over button username:
”Please insert Username”.

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login: Insert correct username and incorrect password
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. Use registered user: "xxxx" with password "1234"

step.actions:
1. Click button  Login 
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click button  Login
5. Verify LogIn Area
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over button username:
”Incorrect password”

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login: Insert correct password and incorrect username
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. Use registered user: "1234" with password "xxxx"

step.actions:
1. Click button  Login 
2. Enter invalid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click button  Login
5. Verify LogIn Area
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over button username:
”Incorrect username”

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login: Incorrect size of the symbols of a password
testcase.preconditions: Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/

step.actions:
1. Click button Register
2. Enter username
3. Enter email
4. Enter password with max. 4 symbols long
5. Enter the same password 
6. Click the acceptance of registration
7. Verify LogIn Area
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over button username:
”The password must be at least 5 symbols long”

testcase.name: Successful loading category for login users
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/ 
2. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. User click on the Login button
2. User input field username
3. User input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Clicking on Photo Album button
6. Clicking on Categoriy (right side menu)
7. Verify All Categories are loaded correctly
step.expectedresults: All available categories are displayed, including their name, appropriate icon and an “Add Picture” button

testcase.name: Successful loading photos by category
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/ 
2. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. User click on the Login button
2. User input field username
3. User input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Clicking on Photo Album button
6. Clicking on Category (right side menu)
7. User  click on the selected category
8. Verify Category Order
step.expectedresults: Show all photos to selected category whit information about each photo (Author, likes, vote and name of pictures)

testcase.name: Successful loading all photos
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/
2. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. User click on the Login button
2. User input field username
3. User input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Clicking on Photo Album button
6. Clicking on Photos (right side menu)
7. Verify All Photos are Loaded
step.expectedresults: Show all photos and information about each photo (Author, likes, vote and name of pictures)

testcase.name: Successful loading enlarged photo
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/
2. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. User click on the Login button
2. User fills field username
3. Clicking on Login button
4. Clicking on Photo
5. Verify Photo is shown correctly
step.expectedresults: Show  photo in large format and information about  photo (Author, likes, vote and name of pictures)

testcase.name: Successful upload photo
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. User must have picture on his computer.
3. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "12346"

step.actions:
1. User click on the Login button
2. User input field username
3. User input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Clicking on Photo Album button
6. Clicking on Category (right side menu)
7. Clicking on button Add Picture
8. Entered name on picture
9. Clicking on Choose File button
10. Pick the picture you want to upload
11. Verefy Picture is Uploaded
step.expectedresults: Picture automatically to the select category and the user should be relocated to the page whit photos from this category

testcase.name: Successful like a photo
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/
2. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456".

step.actions:
1. User click on the Login button
2. User input field username
3. User input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Clicking on Likes button (heart shape button) on photo we liked
6. Verefy Like is Added
step.expectedresults: Likes should be updated immediately without reload the page

testcase.name: Successful load picture’s comments
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/
2. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. User click on the Login button
2. User input field username
3. User input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Clicking on selected picture
6. Clicking on Comments button
7. Verify comments area
step.expectedresults: Displayed comment or comments if have any

testcase.name: Successful add category (Administration)
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. Use Administration account: "xxxx" with password "xxxx"

step.actions:
1. Administrator click on the Login button
2. Administrator input field username
3. Administrator input field password
4. Clicking on Login button
5. Clicking on Photo Album button
6. Clicking on Category (right side menu)
7. Clicking on button Add Category
8. Administrator  validating category name
9. Administrator  validating icon size on new category
10. Clicking Add new category
11. Verify Categori Area
step.expectedresults: Reload page whit new category shows

testcase.name: Successful edit category (Administration)
testcase.preconditions:

step.actions:

2. Administrator input field username
3. Administrator input field password
4. Clicking on Login button

7. Clicking on edit category button (change name or what wants to edit)

testcase.name: Unsuccessful upload photo
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. User must have picture on his computer.
3. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. Click button Login
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click button Login
5. Click button Photo Album 
6. Click on Category (right side menu)
7. Click button Add Picture
8. Enter a  title of the picture
9. Click button Choose File
10. Choose picture for upload with size more than 8MB
11. Verify Unsuccessful Upload
step.expectedresults:
The picture will not upload. 
Shows up message in red color over button choose file:
”The file is too big. The maximum allowed size of the image is 8MB”

testcase.name: Unsuccessful upload photo: It’s not entered title of the image
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. User must have picture on his computer.
3. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. Click button Login
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click button Login
5. Click button Photo Album 
6. Click on Category (right side menu)
7. Click button Add Picture
8. Click button Choose File
9. Pick the picture you want to upload
10. Verify Unsuccessful Upload
step.expectedresults:
The picture will not upload. 
Shows up message in red color over field Picture title:
”You must enter a title of the image.”

testcase.name: Successful Ban user (Administration)
testcase.preconditions:

2. Use Administration account:   "xxxx" with password "xxxx"

step.actions:

2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click button Login
5. Click button Photo Album 
6. Click on Users (right side menu)
7. Select user
8. Clicking on Ban User button
9. Verify User Ban
step.expectedresults: The user must be ban.

testcase.name: Unsuccessful add comment
testcase.preconditions:
1. Open http://photoalbum.bugs3.com/.
2. Use registered user:  "User01" with password "123456"

step.actions:
1. Click button Login
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click button Login
5. Click button Comments
6. Write only 1 symbol for comment 
7. Click Ok Button
8. Verify Comment Area
step.expectedresults:
Shows up message in red color over field Comments:
”You must enter a comment at least 2 symbols long.”
